channel.title: Hope Church Podcast
channel.description: In response to the greatness of God, Hope Church unites together to change lives by leading people into an authentic and growing relationship with Jesus Christ, impacting Las Vegas, the West and the World in the power of the Holy Spirit. We seek to join in God's Kingdom activity of changing lives, multiplying churhcs, and exalting Himself among the nations through relationships with others.
channel.generator: Feeder 2.3.2(1632); Mac OS X Version 10.6.8 (Build 10K549) http://reinventedsoftware.com/feeder/
channel.copyright: 2001-2012 Hope Baptist Church of Las Vegas, Inc.
channel.itunes:author: Hope Baptist Church
channel.itunes:subtitle: Connecting people to live the life of a Jesus follower.
channel.itunes:summary: Connecting people to live the life of a Jesus follower.
channel.itunes:keywords: hope, baptist, jesus, christ, god, christian, christianity, bible, spirituality, church, las vegas
